name: International Conference on Need based Solar Applications and One day Workshop
content: In order to cope with present and future energy demands, renewable and environment-friendly energy resources are urgently required. This conference aims at investigating the capability of potential semiconducting materials frequently used to convert the solar energy into other form of energy (Thermal/electrical). The main goal of the proposed workshop is to train the students and share the ideas/issues relevant to solar system among renowned national and international scientists. By attending this event one will get deep insights on changing landscape viz. cost, policy, industry etc. of solar energy market in Pakistan.
